Amazon selected Arlington, Virginia as the location for its second headquarters in 2018. Amazon HQ2 is an investment of more than $2.5 billion and will result in 25,000 new Amazon jobs.

In 2018, after considering 238 proposals from communities across North America, Amazon selected Arlington, Virginia as the location for its new second headquarters (HQ2). As one of the most significant economic development projects in recent history, Amazon's decision to select Northern Virginia ...
